title: Tesla shares close down 5% after price cuts, Model 3 refresh
description: Tesla shares dropped Friday after the company cut prices on cars in the U.S.

title: Dell has best day on stock market since its relisting in 2018 after earnings sail past estimates
description: Dell shares surged more than 20% on Friday after the company reported better-than-expected earnings and revenue.

title: Hollywood sheds 17,000 jobs in August amid ongoing strikes
description: The ongoing Writers Guild of America and SAG-AFTRA strikes have resulted in a monthly decrease of 17,000 jobs in Hollywood.

title: Taylor Swift Eras Tour concert film is already a blockbuster with historic first-day ticket sales
description: In less than 24 hours on the market, ticket sales for Taylor Swift's Eras Tour concert film have broken records.

title: Russia's Putin says he will soon meet with China President Xi as war in Ukraine drags on
description: The upcoming meeting comes amid steady gains by Ukrainian forces on the battlefield.

title: Dell has best day on stock market since its relisting in 2018 after earnings sail past estimates
description: Dell shares surged more than 20% on Friday after the company reported better-than-expected earnings and revenue.

title: Biden kept a Ford EV battery plant from going overseas. But not everyone is happy about it.
description: Ford was considering sites outside the U.S. but was lured to Michigan in part because of new federal tax credits that were part of the Inflation Reduction Act.

title: Bezos snubbed Musk's SpaceX for huge satellite launch contract, Amazon shareholder says
description: An Amazon shareholder lawsuit alleges the company snubbed SpaceX for satellite launch contracts because of Jeff Bezos'  personal rivalry with Elon Musk.

title: When to wear masks as Covid cases rise, new variants emerge in the U.S.
description: The decision to mask depends on a few things: you personal risk level, Covid rates in your region and who you might make contact with, experts say.

title: FTC allows Amgen to move forward with $27.8 billion Horizon Therapeutics acquisition
description: The FTC had filed a lawsuit in May seeking to block the acquisition, arguing that the deal would "stifle competition" in the pharmaceutical industry.

title: Unemployment rate unexpectedly rose to 3.8% in August as payrolls increased by 187,000
description: Nonfarm payrolls were expected to increase 170,000 in August, according to a Dow Jones consensus estimate.

title: Musk's X to collect biometric information and employment data
description: X will start collecting users' biometric information and employment history, according to an update to its privacy policy.

title: Weight loss drugmaker Novo Nordisk vies to become Europe's most valuable company, toppling LVMH
description: Novo Nordisk overtook the Louis Vuitton owner's market capitalization as investors bet on the potential of its weight loss drugs.

title: 'Really bad economics': Nobel laureate Joseph Stiglitz explains where the Fed went wrong on inflation
description: The Federal Reserve "didn't do their homework" and mischaracterized the spike in inflation, according to Nobel Prize-winning economist Joseph Stiglitz.

title: Chinese smartphone maker teases a foldable smartphone that you can wear like a purse
description: The Honor V Purse is a smartphone that folds outward with a top strip that contains the camera. Customizable straps can be attached to the device.

title: Huawei spinoff Honor launches foldable phone globally as Chinese firm looks to rival Apple, Samsung
description: The Honor Magic V2 comes with all the latest features expected of a premium phone from a triple lens camera to sports Qualcomm's latest mobile chipset.

title: Robotics giant ABB 'pretty pessimistic' on China: 'It will be challenging for the rest of the year'
description: China, a powerhouse of manufacturing often referred as "the world's factory" due to its influence on global trade, is ABB's second-biggest market.

title: A Saudi-Israel deal could dramatically reshape the Middle East — but don't expect it anytime soon
description: A deal between Israel and Saudi Arabia could dramatically reshape the Middle East.

title: 'The war is coming home to Russia': Ukraine turns the tables on Moscow as drone warfare intensifies
description: A dramatic uptick in drone attacks targeting Russian territory is likely to continue and could be a game-changer in the next phase of the war, analysts say.

title: China says the best way to 'de-risk' is to restore stability with the U.S.
description: Beijing said Thursday that restoring stability in U.S.-China trade relations is the best way to "de-risk."
